name: part_007
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】豪華ゲスト & 生演奏 & 告知あり！ #博衣こより生誕Live2025 -FIRST STEP- 【博衣こより⧸ホロライブ】 [ERIxQaoEbXs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Hakui Koyori performs 'Otome yo Motome yo Q.E.D.' with guest Momosuzu Nene.
Koyori MC section, hyping up the audience for an original song medley.
Hakui Koyori performs a medley of her original songs.

subtitles.original: 乙女よ求めよQ.E.D.
subtitles.english: O Maiden, Seek Q.E.D.

subtitles.original: 好き×好き×好き×好き×好き×好き＝？
subtitles.english: Love x Love x Love x Love x Love x Love = ?

subtitles.original: ねえ。僕らふたり 人類の終わりに
subtitles.english: Hey. The two of us, at the end of humanity,

subtitles.original: 割り切れなかったあまりだったら
subtitles.english: If we were the remainder that couldn't be divided out...

subtitles.original: ねえ。少し手伝って
subtitles.english: Hey. Help me out a little

subtitles.original: 人類の課題
subtitles.english: With humanity's challenge.

subtitles.original: 好き×好き×好き×好き×好き×好き
subtitles.english: Love x Love x Love x Love x Love x Love,

subtitles.original: 答え合わせしましょう？
subtitles.english: Shall we check our answers?

subtitles.original: 見つけちゃう！ 魔法の公式
subtitles.english: I'll find it! The magic formula.

subtitles.original: 化学反応してるよね
subtitles.english: A chemical reaction is happening, right?

subtitles.original: 僕ら問題は
subtitles.english: Our problem is

subtitles.original: まだまだまだまだ未解決
subtitles.english: Still, still, still, still unsolved.

subtitles.original: 証明中 恋の予想
subtitles.english: Currently proving the hypothesis of love.

subtitles.original: 物理法則 書き足しちゃうもんね
subtitles.english: I'll even add to the laws of physics!

subtitles.original: これぞ天才だ！
subtitles.english: This is what a genius is!

subtitles.original: あの子より この子より
subtitles.english: More than that girl, more than this girl,

subtitles.original: もっと（好きって）言ってちょうだい
subtitles.english: Please say (you love me) even more!

subtitles.original: 乙女よ乙女よ Q.E.D.!
subtitles.english: O maidens, O maidens, Q.E.D.!

subtitles.original: 今、以上、最大。
subtitles.english: Now, more than ever, the greatest.

subtitles.original: 叶えましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's make it come true!

subtitles.original: みんな楽しんでる？
subtitles.english: Is everyone having fun?

subtitles.original: ここからはオリ曲メドレー！
subtitles.english: From here on, it's an original song medley!

subtitles.original: 史上最大のQUESTION!
subtitles.english: The Greatest QUESTION in History!

subtitles.original: 行くよ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 究極新時代 メラメラ抑えられないのです。
subtitles.english: A new ultimate era, I can't suppress this flare-up.

subtitles.original: レギュラなので余裕です。
subtitles.english: I'm a regular, so it's a breeze.

subtitles.original: 今夜は頭脳で素直。
subtitles.english: Tonight, I'll be honest with my brains.

subtitles.original: またひとつ発見
subtitles.english: Another discovery:

subtitles.original: マヨネーズは飲み物です。
subtitles.english: Mayonnaise is a drink.

subtitles.original: カモン Q & A
subtitles.english: Come on, Q & A!

subtitles.original: あっちこっち ほら巻き起こる
subtitles.english: Look, it's breaking out here and there,

subtitles.original: ドラマに体当たり
subtitles.english: Crashing headfirst into drama.

subtitles.original: 次元感じてみなきゃ始まらない
subtitles.english: It won't start until you try to feel the dimensions.

subtitles.original: 研究 精製 共有
subtitles.english: Research, refine, share.

subtitles.original: DEAR YOU, ARE YOU OK?
subtitles.english: DEAR YOU, ARE YOU OK?

subtitles.original: 一緒にドンドン過ごしましょう
subtitles.english: Let's spend more and more time together.

subtitles.original: あなたと経験していこう タイム
subtitles.english: Let's gain experiences with you, time!

subtitles.original: 全部の夢 その手で Q.E.D.
subtitles.english: All your dreams, in those hands, Q.E.D.

subtitles.original: 仕掛けはまた次がある
subtitles.english: There's always another trick up my sleeve.

subtitles.original: 泣いて笑って WOW
subtitles.english: Crying and laughing, WOW!

subtitles.original: どんな日も永遠 願わす MY
subtitles.english: I wish for eternity, every day, MY...

subtitles.original: その胸に芽生えてほしい幸せ
subtitles.english: I want happiness to sprout in that heart of yours.

subtitles.original: 今、以上、最大。叶えましょう！
subtitles.english: Now, more than ever, the greatest. Let's make it come true!

subtitles.original: アンバランス
subtitles.english: Unbalance

subtitles.original: 難解すぎる愛の方程式
subtitles.english: The formula for love is too complex.

subtitles.original: 教えて曖昧な答えだす必要はない
subtitles.english: Tell me, there's no need to give a vague answer.

subtitles.original: 未経験的な性質だって
subtitles.english: Even with unexperienced qualities,

subtitles.original: 不安定も歓迎 片足で立って
subtitles.english: Instability is welcome too, standing on one leg...

subtitles.original: 支えていてよ
subtitles.english: Keep supporting me!

subtitles.original: 僕の正体
subtitles.english: My true identity...

subtitles.original: アンバランスな
subtitles.english: Unbalanced,

subtitles.original: 僕の証明
subtitles.english: My proof.

subtitles.original: New Journey
subtitles.english: New Journey

subtitles.original: 始めよう。正義を共に掲げれば
subtitles.english: Let's begin. If we hold up justice together,

subtitles.original: 思い通りの光が
subtitles.english: The light just as we imagined

subtitles.original: 今すぐ飛び出していく
subtitles.english: Will fly out right now.

subtitles.original: 羽ばたいた
subtitles.english: I spread my wings.

subtitles.original: 忘れないでね この眩しさを
subtitles.english: Don't forget this radiance.

subtitles.original: 希望に満ちた輝き 追いかけて
subtitles.english: Chasing the brilliance full of hope,

subtitles.original: あり得ない景色に
subtitles.english: Towards an impossible landscape,

subtitles.original: 辿り着きましょう
subtitles.english: Let's reach it.

subtitles.original: エゴイスティック・シーソー
subtitles.english: Egoistic Seesaw

subtitles.original: 招待 頂戴
subtitles.english: Invitation, please!

subtitles.original: 一緒に楽しもうよ
subtitles.english: Let's have fun together!

subtitles.original: シーソー 壊すほど目一杯 戯れて
subtitles.english: Frolicking so hard on the seesaw that it breaks,

subtitles.original: 居場所を記した
subtitles.english: Marking our place.

subtitles.original: 星屑は日常 何でしょう
subtitles.english: Stardust is everyday life, I wonder what it is.

subtitles.original: 後悔のないよう 最後まで
subtitles.english: Until the end, so there are no regrets,

subtitles.original: 生き急ごう
subtitles.english: Let's live life in the fast lane.

subtitles.original: やりたいこと成して 楽しく
subtitles.english: Doing what we want to do and having fun.

subtitles.original: 手を振って私でいたい 苦しいなんて
subtitles.english: Waving my hand, I want to be myself. Don't tell me it's painful,

subtitles.original: やだわ
subtitles.english: I hate that!

subtitles.original: ワガママな夢 もっと 謳歌しよう
subtitles.english: Let's enjoy our selfish dreams even more!

subtitles.original: Tear-Gazer
subtitles.english: Tear-Gazer

subtitles.original: 行くよ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!
